item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, April 26, 2024 at 5:40 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Military briefing: Russia’s narrowing advantage in Ukraine
2. Alphabet surges past $2tn valuation as it announces first dividend
3. Thoma Bravo to buy UK-listed Darktrace for £4.3bn
4. Fed’s preferred inflation metric rose to 2.7% in March
5. Anglo American set to be bought or broken up after rejecting £31bn BHP offer, investors believe
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, April 26, 2024 at 5:40 PM UTC
